p: Contemplating subsequences, in-depth and systematic research is needed to reveal the psychological impact of infectious disease and subsequent epidemics. This study was aimed to address the literature gap on the psychological morbidity induced from current COVID-19 epidemic and also systematically reviews the prevalence of psychological problems on account of the prolonged confinement of Chinese citizens. The study findings would be helpful to understand the psychological impact of such epidemics and strengthen future preparedness.
